languages.text: Судя по крови, истекающей из каждой щели расколотой брони, ксенос внутри нее словно бы взорвался. Что стало причиной такой смерти, неясно.
Judging by the blood dripping from every crack in the broken armour, the xenos inside practically exploded. The cause of this gruesome death is unclear.
languages.original_text: Судя по крови, истекающей из каждой щели расколотой брони, ксенос внутри нее словно бы взорвался. Что стало причиной такой смерти, неясно.

traits.locale_text: Judging by the blood dripping from every crack in the broken armour, the xenos inside practically exploded. The cause of this gruesome death is unclear.

Judging by the blood dripping from every crack in the broken armour, the xenos inside practically exploded. The cause of this gruesome death is unclear.

languages.text: 破碎的盔甲每条缝隙都在滴血，盔甲里面的异形恐怕整个人都爆开了。至于里面的人为什么会死得这么惨，原因尚未明确。
languages.original_text: Judging by the blood dripping from every crack in the broken armour, the xenos inside practically exploded. The cause of this gruesome death is unclear.

traits.locale_text: 破碎的盔甲每条缝隙都在滴血，盔甲里面的异形恐怕整个人都爆开了。至于里面的人为什么会死得这么惨，原因尚未明确。

languages.text: 壊れたアーマーの全ての割れ目から滴る血を見るに、このゼノの内臓は実質的な意味で爆発したのだ。このぞっとする死の原因は不明である。
languages.original_text: Judging by the blood dripping from every crack in the broken armour, the xenos inside practically exploded. The cause of this gruesome death is unclear.

traits.locale_text: 壊れたアーマーの全ての割れ目から滴る血を見るに、このゼノの内臓は実質的な意味で爆発したのだ。このぞっとする死の原因は不明である。

languages.text: À en croire le sang qui coule de chaque fente de l'armure brisée, les entrailles du xénos ont pratiquement explosé. La cause de cette mort horrible n'est pas claire.
languages.original_text: Judging by the blood dripping from every crack in the broken armour, the xenos inside practically exploded. The cause of this gruesome death is unclear.

traits.locale_text: À en croire le sang qui coule de chaque fente de l'armure brisée, les entrailles du xénos ont pratiquement explosé. La cause de cette mort horrible n'est pas claire.

languages.text: A juzgar por la sangre que gotea de las fisuras de esta destruida armadura, las entrañas de este xenos prácticamente explotaron. Es difícil discernir la causa de esta macabra muerte.
languages.original_text: Judging by the blood dripping from every crack in the broken armour, the xenos inside practically exploded. The cause of this gruesome death is unclear.

traits.locale_text: A juzgar por la sangre que gotea de las fisuras de esta destruida armadura, las entrañas de este xenos prácticamente explotaron. Es difícil discernir la causa de esta macabra muerte.

languages.text: Angesichts des Blutes, das aus jeder Ritze der zerstörten Rüstung tropft, ist der Xenos förmlich implodiert. Die Ursache dieses grauenhaften Todes ist unklar.
languages.original_text: Judging by the blood dripping from every crack in the broken armour, the xenos inside practically exploded. The cause of this gruesome death is unclear.

traits.locale_text: Angesichts des Blutes, das aus jeder Ritze der zerstörten Rüstung tropft, ist der Xenos förmlich implodiert. Die Ursache dieses grauenhaften Todes ist unklar.

languages.text: Parçalanmış zırhtaki her bir çatlaktan damlayan kana bakıldığında içindeki zeno her neyse patlamış. Bu korkunç ölümün nedeni belirsiz.
languages.original_text: Judging by the blood dripping from every crack in the broken armour, the xenos inside practically exploded. The cause of this gruesome death is unclear.
